name: Lucy in Space!
description:
Lucy is lost in space amongst hundreds of aliens! She knows she has no chance, but she will at least take as many aliens down with her as possible!

This game only uses the mouse as input. Left click to pew pew and right click to brrrrrr.

This game was made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2021, with the theme "Stronger Together". The tie in to the theme is that the aliens gravitate towards each other and become a big strong alien bunch.

Music by Romariogrande, "Tentacle Wedding"

All other sounds made up.
